item.title: Analytics Platform
item.description: Our offset analytics platform is the the de facto research tool for professionals seeking to maximize offset purchase efficiency. Thereâ€™s no comparable mechanism out there for performing data analysis across registries. Data fields are homogenized across registries to ensure apples-to-apples comparisons. Our smart database structures and aggregates information from 14,696 projects across 5 major registries, representing 2,341 unique project developers operating in 151 countries. In total, we have clean data underpinning more than 3 billion credits.
